title: Tier-2 Audit of Promotion Gate Integrity and Signal Attrition

deliverable_A_promotion_attrition_decomp.summary: The Promotion Gate is NOT the bottleneck. Signal attrition occurs upstream at hypothesis-to-experiment conversion.

hypothesis_to_experiment.diagnosis: CRITICAL BOTTLENECK. 61 active hypotheses with ZERO experiments. Hypothesis-to-Experiment conversion pipeline is broken for FINN-T and finn_crypto_scheduler.

experiment_to_min_sample.diagnosis: Only EXP_ALPHA_SAT_F (16/15) reached min_sample_size. EXP_ALPHA_SAT_A at 19/30 (63%). 6 experiments had 0 outcomes.

promotion_gate_evaluation.diagnosis: Gate works correctly. ONE evaluation -> PASS (DSR=1.438, PBO=0.4, family_risk=0). Gate is sharp, not opaque.

single_gate_evaluation.note: Hypothesis later FALSIFIED despite passing gate

v_promotion_gate_status_blocking.binding_criterion: family_inflation_risk IS NULL AND pbo_probability IS NULL

deliverable_B_near_miss_identification.definition: Hypotheses surviving Tier-1 (ACTIVE) but unable to reach Promotion Gate due to pipeline gap
deliverable_B_near_miss_identification.failure_mode: SINGLE_CRITERION: No overfitting metrics (no experiments to compute them)
deliverable_B_near_miss_identification.informational_value: UNDETERMINED - cannot assess without experiment outcomes

Q1_is_zero_promotions_plausible.evidence: 0/1045 is caused by pipeline failure, not gate strictness. The ONE gate evaluation PASSED (DSR=1.438).
Q1_is_zero_promotions_plausible.caveat: n=1 evaluation insufficient for statistical inference

Q2_binding_criterion.root_cause: No experiments exist for active hypotheses, so metrics cannot be computed

Q3_near_miss_value.evidence: 61 hypotheses have falsification_criteria and causal_graph_depth 2-5 (structural validity), but no outcome data exists

root_cause_diagnosis.primary: PIPELINE GAP: No mechanism converts FINN-T/finn_crypto_scheduler hypotheses into experiments
root_cause_diagnosis.secondary: OUTCOME STARVATION: Even legacy experiments collect outcomes slowly (19/30 max)
root_cause_diagnosis.tertiary: HORIZON EXPIRY: Hypotheses die at 24-72h timeout before experiments created
root_cause_diagnosis.gate_verdict: GATE IS HEALTHY - 100% pass rate on eligible entries
root_cause_diagnosis.pipeline_verdict: PIPELINE IS BROKEN at step 1->2 (hypothesis to experiment)

recommendations: R1: URGENT - Fix hypothesis-to-experiment conversion for FINN-T and finn_crypto_scheduler
R2: Extend horizon expiry from 24h to 48h for ACTIVE hypotheses with falsification_criteria
R3: Do NOT modify Promotion Gate thresholds (insufficient data, gate works when tested)
R4: Increase outcome generation rate (35 total outcomes all-time is critically low)
R5: Create alert when active_hypotheses > 50 with zero experiments
